name: test_CMS_203_Verify_Unread_Notifications_Exist
description:
Test Case 203: Verify that there is at least one unread notification.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Notifications page
4. Check for unread notifications
5. If no unread notifications, switch to Read tab
6. Verify notification columns are visible
7. Verify all required columns are present
descriptionHtml:
Test Case 203: Verify that there is at least one unread notification.

Test Steps:

  1. Launch the browser
  2. Login as admin user
  3. Navigate to Notifications page
  4. Check for unread notifications
  5. If no unread notifications, switch to Read tab
  6. Verify notification columns are visible
  7. Verify all required columns are present
statusMessage:
AssertionError: Locator expected to be visible
Actual value: <element(s) not found> 
Call log:
  - LocatorAssertions.to_be_visible with timeout 5000ms
  -   - waiting for get_by_role("heading", name="Programs")
